1.title: LinKONG/Rainbow Dash & Bernstein
1.plot: In the season four premiere, MAD tells the classic tale of America's greatest giant ape president. Then a manly little dude learns how to be a brony.

2.title: Pokémonsters, Inc./Bane & Kate
2.plot: It's total chaos as Ash Ketchum tries to catch all the Monsters! Then, a woman reconnects with her super villain brother. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

3.title: Wreck It Gandalph/The Big Bird Theory
3.plot: Gandalf is tired of being a wizard and escapes to other movies. Then, the cast of The Big Bang Theory are tired of their show and escape to another world. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

4.title: Les the Miz/The Lex Factor
4.plot: It's a musical wrestling spectacular in the past! Then, Lex Luthor holds a reality show for villains. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

5.title: Papa/1600 Finn
5.plot: A family is haunted by a small blue menace. Then, Finn the Human moves into the White House. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

6.title: G.I. E.I. Joe/Dog with a Captain's Log
6.plot: The G.I. Joes recruit some help from the farm. Then, the Starship Enterprise has a hairy new crew member. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

7.title: S Cape from Planet Earth/The X-Mentalist
7.plot: Scorch Supernova has to save a defenseless man of steel. Then, the X-Men give up being super heroes and become cops. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

8.title: POblivion/Umbrellamentary
8.plot: Jack Harper is the last man on Earth, but there's also a talking kung-fu panda. Then, Sherlock Holmes goes missing and it's up to another beloved British character to save him ... Mary Poppins?! Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

9.title: Jaws the Great and Powerful/Old Spock's Off Their Spockers
9.plot: When a balloon carries a giant shark to the Land of Oz ... things get weird. Then, Old Spock spends his free time pranking his younger self and the rest of the Enterprise crew. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

10.title: Jacks the Giant Slayers/The Most Beautiful Voice
10.plot: When the famous Jack gets crushed by giants, the kingdom has to call in whatever other Jacks are left. Then, Prince Eric holds a singing competition to find the identity of his true love. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

11.title: The Great Batsby/Big Time Gold Rush
11.plot: A charming narrator tells of his time with an eccentric man in the 1920s, who dresses like a bat. Then, the dudes from Big Time Rush strike gold. Literally. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

12.title: First White House Down/McDuck Dynasty
12.plot: It's a MAD sequel as George Washington once again picks up his axe to fight the dreaded cherry trees! Then a rich old duck yells at his nephews. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

13.title: After Bert/Downton Shaggy
13.plot: The danger is real as Will Smith crashes onto a planet with a bunch of Muppets. Then, Downton Abbey gets a new footman with a big appetite. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

14.title: Lone Rango/Doctor Who's Line Is It Anyway?
14.plot: The Lone Ranger recruits a lizard because Tonto is too annoying. Then the Doctor must face his greatest challenge yet: improving games.

15.title: Iron Bland 3/Monsters Community
15.plot: Iron Man battles the Mandarin and, no, he doesn't call the Avengers - so who cares? Then, the monsters go back to college: Greendale Community College! Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

16.title: Star Blecch Into Dumbness/Stark Tank
16.plot: The crew of the Enterprise dumbly goes where many movies have gone before. Then, Iron Man and other wealthy super heroes offer to fund the endeavors of others, if the pitch is right. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

17.title: The Flash & the Furious/Saved by Adele
17.plot: The Fast and Furious crew gets an assist from the fastest man in the world. But is he the most furious? Then, a dated high school sitcom gets singing lessons. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

18.title: Lukewarm Bodies/Does Someone Have to GOa?
18.plot: Can a lovesick zombie overcome his craving for brains AND overcome how lazy zombie movies have gotten? Then, the Green Lanterns are asked which of their teammates should be fired. Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

19.title: Pacific Ring/Horton Hears a Whodunnit!
19.plot: Giant monsters can only be defeated with one thing: giant robot wrestlers! Then, a group of strangers are asked to solve a murder by an elephant in a tuxedo. Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

20.title: World War ZZZ/SHAZAM! & Cat
20.plot: Can Brad Pitt save the world from zombies before everyone falls asleep because this movie is boring? Then, Sam and Cat have a new kid to babysit - a kid who transforms into a super hero! Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

21.title: Doraline/Monster Mashville
21.plot: It's a MAD Halloween special! Dora the Explorer travels to the "other world" and gets more than she bargained for. Then, two monster songstresses compete to write a Halloween song.

22.title: Mad's 100th Episode Special
22.plot: It's MAD's doubled-sized 100th episode spectacular! This anniversary episode pokes fun at Man of Steel, Sanjay and Craig and One Direction. Plus, a very special Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

23.title: Dullverine/Under the Dumb
23.plot: Wolverine goes all the way to Japan to avoid being in another boring Wolverine movie, but it doesn't work. Then, a small town is trapped under a stupid dome. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

24.title: Still Hungry Games/Agents of S.M.U.R.F.
24.plot: The fans demand another Hunger Games and so there is one. Then, top secret agents are sent by a balding wizard to capture blue elves. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

25.title: Alfred's Game/We Are X-Men
25.plot: Earth's only hope is Alfred E. Neuman ... so we're doomed! Then, a bunch of sad mutants get over their failed relationships. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy, Candy and more.

1.title: Avaturd/CSiCarly
1.plot: Jake Smelly explores a planet of blue cat people in search of a rare element. Horatio Caine gets paired up with the iCarly crew for a murder mystery.

2.title: TransBOREmores/Star Wars: The Groan Wars
2.plot: Optimus Prime starts slacking on the job, much to Sam's dismay. In a new episode of Star Wars: The Groan Wars, your favorite characters save the galaxy from hammy acting.

3.title: 2012 Dalmatians/Grey's in Anime
3.plot: When the Mayan apocalypse comes in the form of puppies falling from the sky, a family tries to survive. A hospital patient's sedative-induced anime dream turns the action up to over 9000.

4.title: Star Blecch/uGlee
4.plot: Can Captain Smirk put aside his differences with Mr. Shlock to save Earth? When the glee club loses its funding, how will they raise more money? Probably by singing a song.

5.title: WALL-E-NATOR/Extreme Renovation: House Edition - Superman's Fortress of Solitude
5.plot: Wall-E tries to stop the world from being covered in garbage. Superman is surprised when his fortress of solitude becomes a fortress of FUNitude.

6.title: Pirates of the Neverland: At Wit's End/Batman Family Feud
6.plot: Captain Jack Sparrow teams up Captain Hook, to teach him how to be a cool pirate. Batman infiltrates the set of a game show as a contestant in hopes of catching The Riddler.

7.title: Cliffordfield/Big Time Rushmore
7.plot: A big red dog eats New York City. Then, America gets ready for the hottest new band - of former presidents! Plus Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more.

8.title: Fantastic Megan Fox/Mad vs. Wild
8.plot: Megan is a fox, literally, and she's going to show the world what a fantastic actress she can be. Then, MAD takes to the woods and shows you how to survive in the wild.

9.title: I Love You, Iron Man/Ben 10 Franklin
9.plot: Tony Stark has got it all, except a best friend. Maybe Spider-Man wants to hang out? Ben Franklin invents something a lot cooler than the wood stove: Ben 10's Omnitrix.

10.title: Class of the Titans/Zeke and Lex Luthor
10.plot: The epic battle of gods and mortals plays out at a high school. Zeke gets some skateboarding help from his new best friend, Lex Luthor.

11.title: S'UP/Mouse M.D.
11.plot: Everything is great in Carl's flying house, until the cast of The Jersey Shore knocks on his door. Then, a bitter, angry mouse doctor does the rounds in his hospital.

12.title: Da Grinchy Code/Duck
12.plot: Christmas will be ruined in Whoville unless Tom Hanks can solve Da Grinchy Code. The nation's secret inelegance database is downloaded into the brain of an ordinary duck.

13.title: Snott Pilgrim vs. the Wonderful World of Disney/Malcolm in the Middle Earth
13.plot: Snot Pilgrim has the perfect life, except that his girlfriend Snow White has seven tiny exes. Then, it's just a couple of hobbits trying to make it in this crazy middle world.

14.title: Pokémon Park/WWER
14.plot: The wrestling superstars of WWE know a thing or two about breaking bones - but how are they at mending them?

15.title: So You Think You Can Train Your Dragon How to Dance/Yo Gagga Gagga!
15.plot: Hiccup the Viking learns that dragons can be trained to dance. Lady Gaga hosts a kids' show starring tiny celebrities. Plus Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more.

16.title: The Straight A-Team/Gaming's Next Top Princess
16.plot: A covert special team helps a student get good grades. Video game characters compete in a reality show. Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more.

17.title: The Buzz Identity/Two and a Half Man
17.plot: The coolest toy ever gets his memory erased. Who is he? How does he know karate? Why does he know Spanish? Then it's a sitcom with everyone's two favorite two - plus a centaur.

18.title: Are You Karate Kidding Me?/The Fresh Prawn of Bel-Air
18.plot: Moving to China can be a big change, especially when a talking panda keeps beating you up. An alien refugee gets relocated to live with his uncle and aunt in Bel-Air.

19.title: HOPS/Naru210
19.plot: The LAPD track down a runaway Easter bunny. Then Naruto is sent to the only place that can tolerate a spoiled brat like him: Beverly Hills.

20.title: Ko-Bee Movie/Law & Ogre
20.plot: A basketball-playing bee named Ko-Bee competes with Kobe Bryant for a spot on the Lakers. Then Shrek and Donkey take the law into their own hands.

21.title: Pooh Grit/Not-a-Fan-a-Montana
21.plot: Christopher Robin hires Marshall Pooh to capture Tigger. Big League Pika Chew is the gum for baseball players seeking an electrifying performance. Cobra Commander starts his own daytime talk show. The Farto-Tuner proves that Auto-tune really can improve anything. Miley Cyrus tries to stop Justin Bieber from stealing her fanbase.

22.title: The Social Netjerk/Smallville: Turn Off the Clark
22.plot: Mark Zuckerberg creates Facebook, but finds himself repeatedly sued (especially with Sean Parker involved). Survivor's immunity idol becomes a licensed product. Thor is banished to Jersey, where he parties like a god. Prince Zuko creates a job training program for Benders. Disappointed with Smallville's finale, Superman finds work in Julie Taymor's new musical.

23.title: TwiGH School Musical/Avenger Time
23.plot: Edward and Jacob get some musical competition for Bella's heart. The Avengers get transported to a more adventurous time. Plus Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more.

24.title: ArTHOR/The Big Fang Theory
24.plot: ArThor is a vain and spoiled god who is sent to earth to get a job. Edward and Jacob are re-imagined as nerds on a sitcom. Plus Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more.

25.title: Ribbitless/The Clawfice
25.plot: A frog eats a strange butterfly and is transformed into a star. There's only one man tough enough to run The Office: Wolverine! Plus Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more.

26.title: Force Code/Flammable
26.plot: Colter Stevens from Source Code is sent mentally back in time many times to try and prevent the destruction of the Death Star, but couldn't get the job done right. Katy Putty sings her new number entitled "Flammable" as a reminder to all stop motion-animated and puppet characters that they are merely flammable and not so special.

1.title: RiOa/Thomas the Unstoppable Tank Engine
1.plot: After hearing that it gives the power to fly, Blu steals the ring from Hal Jordan, gets sent to Oa, and makes up a team of flightless birds so he can save Jewel from Nigel and Marcel. Thomas the Tank Engine doesn't have any brakes and can't stop going around the Island of Sodor. So it's up to Frank Barnes and Percy to help stop him from crashing.

2.title: Super 80's/Captain America's Got Talent
2.plot: JJ Abrams wanted to capture his childhood, but when a train full of stuff from the '80s crashes into his movie, his childhood might capture him! Then, Captain America sets out to prove he's got the talent to join the Avengers. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

3.title: Kung Fu Blander/Destroy, Bob the Builder, Destroy
3.plot: When Lord Shen arrives with an army of Angry Birds, Po must find a something that is "Black and White" to defeat him. Bob the Builder receives a visit from Andrew W.K. who hosts the reality show, "Destroy, Build, Destroy", and starts destroying his vehicles and builds them into something else.

4.title: Pirates of the Pair of Tweens/Konan the Kardashian
4.plot: When the fountain of youth works too well, Jack Sparrow is stuck babysitting a couple of tweens. Then, Conan the Barbarian settles down with a nice woman and takes her last name, because he's progressive like that. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

5.title: Fast Hive/Minute to Flynn It
5.plot: Winnie the Pooh recruits some "Fast and Furious" help in his quest for honey. Then, Sam Flynn gets sucked into the dumbest game show on the grid.

6.title: Cowboys & Alien Force/ThunderLOLcats
6.plot: A cowboy wakes up with no memory and a strange alien bracelet that transforms him into 10 different aliens! Then, the kingdom of Thundera is attacked by the forces of the Internet.

7.title: TransBOREmores 3: Dark of the Blue Moon/The Walking Fred
7.plot: When a portal opens up to the land of the Smurfs, Optimus Prime has to send them back. Then, an Internet viral video goes viral for real! Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

8.title: X-Games: First Class/Criminal Minecraft
8.plot: Learn how Professor X and Magneto met and learned to skateboard. Then, the team from Criminal Minds finds themselves with the blockiest case of their career. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

9.title: Kitchen Nightmares Before Christmas/How I Met Your Mummy
9.plot: After getting tired of all the work he's done, Chef Gordon Ramsay is transported to Halloween Town, where he becomes the scariest person there. Then, a werewolf father tells his werewolf son and mummy daughter how he met their mummy mother.

10.title: Dances with Wolverine: A Footloose Parody/Tater Tots & Tiaras
10.plot: Wolverine gets caught up in a Footloose parody. Then, the world of beauty pageants is about to get a lot more potato-y. Plus, AlfredE. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

11.title: Demise of the Planet of the Apes/The Celebrity Ape-rentice
11.plot: After getting adopted, Caesar gets sent to the pen where Kevin James recruits the apes by planning to rule the world by getting an Oscar. Then, Donald Chimp recruits Caesar, Donkey Kong, and Mojo Jojo by helping him take over the world.

12.title: Money Ball Z/Green Care Bear
12.plot: The future of baseball is super charged when Super Saiyans join the game. But when the Spirit Bat is unleashed, could this lead to the end of baseball? Then, Hal Jordan gets recruited by a different kind of colorful guardians to become the Green Care Bear.

13.title: Spy vs. Spy Kids/The Superhero Millionaire Matchmaker
13.plot: Two kids are shocked to learn that their stepmother is a spy and that the white and black spies are after her! Then, the MillionaireMatchmaker meets her biggest challenge yet: Iron Man and Batman! Plus, more Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

14.title: Captain American't/My Supernatural Sweet Sixteen
14.plot: Can Steve Rogers defeat the Red Skull and make to his 2:30 show? We'd say he Captain American't! Then, the brothers fromSupernatural face the scariest monster yet: a teenage girl.

15.title: FROST/Undercover Claus
15.plot: It's MAD's Christmas special! First, Woody, Buzz and the Toy Story gang get "lost" on a mysterious island of misfits. Then, SantaClaus goes undercover to see how his workshop really runs. Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

16.title: Twilight: Staking Dawn/Cookie Blue
16.plot: Buffy the Vampire Slayer shows up and crashes Edward and Bella's wedding and plans on killing them. Then, Cookie Monster trains to be a street cop.

17.title: WWE Bought a Zoo/2 Broke Powerpuff Girls
17.plot: A man buys a zoo and gets body slammed repeatedly. Then, two of the Powerpuff Girls (Bubbles and Buttercup) find themselves working at a diner.

18.title: DolPhineas and Ferb Tale/VICTORious
18.plot: Phineas and Ferb set out to help a hurt dolphin. Then Doctor Doom enrolls in a performing arts high school. Plus Spy vs. Spy, AlfredE. Neuman and more!

19.title: My Little War Horse/The Tonight Show with Jay Lion-O
19.plot: A My Little Pony gets drafted into World War One. Then, the funniest talk show host in Thundera welcomes his guest Ryan Gosling.

20.title: Al Pacino and the Chipmunks/That's What Super Friends Are For
20.plot: Alvin and the gang wash up on an island and get a new member for their band. Then, DC Comics super heroes sing a song about the virtues of super friendship.

21.title: Real Veal/Celebrity Wife Swamp
21.plot: When a down and out man's robot is destroyed by a cow, he hires the cow! Then, Brad Pitt and Shrek switch wives for the week. Plus,Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

22.title: Garfield of My Dreams/I Hate My Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
22.plot: Garfield leads other comic strip heroes on a mission to get Hollywood to remember them. Then, a mother realizes her sons have become something she always hated: ninja turtles! Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

23.title: The Adventures of Tauntaun/Everybody Loves Rayman
23.plot: The classic comic Tintin gets mistranslated and retold in a galaxy far, far away. Then, a video game character tries to keep the peace when his parents come to stay at his house.

24.title: Potions 11/Moves Like Jabba
24.plot: Harry Potter gets a team of wizards together for one last heist. Then, one of Jabba the Hutt's guards explains how he got his job. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

25.title: Addition Impossible/New Gill
25.plot: Ethan Hunt's team needs to save the world, while also struggling with simple math. Then, Ariel breaks up with the Prince and moves into an apartment with three dudes.

26.title: iChronicle/Hulk Smash
26.plot: The iCarly gang gets new powers for their web show, except for Carly, who goes insane. Then, Hulk auditions to be an Avenger.

1.title: The Iron Giant Lady/Raising a New Hope
1.plot: In the season three premiere, Mecha-Thatcher becomes England's Prime Minister and Martha Plimpton takes on the role of grandmother to Luke Skywalker.

2.title: Yawn Carter/Franklin & Crash
2.plot: John Carter tells the boring story of his trip to Mars. Then, Franklin and Crash Bandicoot are a couple of unconventional video game lawyers.

3.title: Battleship vs. Titanic/Jurassic Parks and Recreation
3.plot: The passengers of the Titanic battle the aliens from Battleship. Then the parks department opens a dinosaur petting zoo. Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

4.title: Betty White & the Huntsman/Ancient Greek Mythbusters
4.plot: The huntsman is sent into the forest to find the fairest one of all ... Betty White?! Then, the Mythbusters crew goes back in time to test myths about the fabled Titans.

5.title: I Am Lorax/Modern Family Circus
5.plot: Will Smith is the last man on earth who speaks for the trees. Then, the cast of Modern Family hang out with their distant relativesfrom the funny pages.

6.title: This Means War Machine/iCharlie
6.plot: Iron Man and War Machine realize they're dating the same woman. You know what this means.... Then, Charlie Brown becomes an Internetstar!

7.title: The Mixed Martial Artist/Aquaman vs. Wild
7.plot: MAD takes on new parodies of pop culture in this satirical animated sketch show. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

8.title: The Blunder Games/The Poop-seidon Adventure
8.plot: The tributes from District 9 battle the tributes from District Hogwarts and District Twilight. Then, it's a MAD classic as a famousboat flips its lid.

9.title: Average-ers/Legend of Dora
9.plot: Nick Fury needs to save the world with whatever heroes don't have their own movies to make. Then, the newest Avatar is revealed:Dora! Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

10.title: Men in Black to the Future/Pokémon of Interest
10.plot: Agent J goes back in time and is run over by Marty McFly. Then a secret agent has to stop a Psyduck before it's involved in a crime! Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

11.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid Icarus/Adjustment Burro
11.plot: The star of Kid Icarus gets picked on by the popular video game characters. Then Eeyore's life is planned out for him ... but what if he changed that plan?

12.title: Taking Nemo/Once Upon a Toon
12.plot: Nemo's father turns to an old friend after his son is taken. Then, the cartoons of yesterday have forgotten who they are. Plus, Spyvs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

13.title: Outtagascar/Fiends
13.plot: The cast of Madagascar wind up on a train filled with characters whose movies are clearly out of gas. Then, six evil villains (Baroness, Mystique, Lord Voldemort, Maleficent, Doctor Doom, and Megatron) try to make their way in New York City.

14.title: The Amazing Spider-Minaj/Go, Dragon Ball, Go!
14.plot: Peter Parker's not the only web head in town. Then, Diego searches for the Dragon Balls so he can save all the animals. Plus, Spyvs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

15.title: Frankenwinnie/ParaMorgan
15.plot: It's a MAD Halloween special! When Winnie the Pooh falls apart, Christopher Robin is determined to bring him back. Then, Norman is aweird little boy who hears voices ... of Morgan Freeman!

16.title: Dark Knight at the Museum/Lemming Snicket's a Series of Unfortunate Video Game Deaths
16.plot: Batman investigates a crime at the Museum of Television. Then, three orphaned lemmings are on the run from the evil Wario. Plus, Spyvs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

17.title: Total Recall Me Maybe/The Asgardigans
17.plot: MAD tries to recall the plot of Total Recall, through song. Then, Thor teams up with some weird creatures from the backyard. Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

18.title: The Bourne Leg-a-Turkey/PilGrimm
18.plot: It's MAD's Thanksgiving special! A turkey secret agent is on the run from the people who created him. Then, the Grimm has to huntdown the most terrifying creature of all: the turducken! Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

19.title: Here Comes the Doom/Brain Purge
19.plot: MAD goes back to school. When a high school needs funding, they turn to comic book arch-villain Doctor Doom. Then, Agent J runs agame show that makes sure you forget everything you know. Plus Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

20.title: Fantastic Four Christmases/Red & White Collar
20.plot: It's a special holiday MAD! Can the Fantastic Four stop fighting and enjoy Christmas together? Then, Santa teams up with the FBI tosolve a case of breaking and entering.

21.title: Hip Hop Hobbit/The Monday Project
21.plot: Bilbo embarks on an old-school quest of rhyming and break dancing. Then, Garfield vows to get his life together. Plus, Alfred E.Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

22.title: The Perks of Being a Wallcrawler/Regular Shogun Warriors
22.plot: Spider-Man gives a shy kid advice so he can become a cool wall crawler. Then, some giant robots hang around and watch TV. Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Alfred E. Neuman and more!

23.title: Twilight: Breaking Down/GOllum ON
23.plot: Bella and Edward have one last challenge to overcome ... finding a babysitter! Then, Gollum joins a support group to help him get overthe loss of his ring. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

24.title: Life of Rhyme/Here Comes Yogi Boo Boo
24.plot: The classic tale of a boy trapped on a boat with a cat in the hat. Then, two dumb gross bears act gross and dumb. Plus, Alfred E.Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

25.title: James Bond: Reply All/Randy Savage: 9th Grade Wrestler
25.plot: James Bond must track down an e-mail that went out to too many people. Then, a 9th grader dons the beard of a legend. Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

26.title: George Washington: Cherry Tree Chopper/Star Wars Earn Stripes
26.plot: The completely true tale of Washington's war against the cherry trees is finally told. Then, do these C-list celebrities have whatit takes to be A-list Storm Troopers? Plus, Alfred E. Neuman, Spy vs. Spy and more!

imdb.title: Mad
plot: The animated version of the classic humor magazine satirizes current pop culture.::tb4000
